page.title: 07AMENITIES
page.content: In{Huddersfield}there are some good things to do for{young people,}but there could be{more.}There are{discos and{youth-clubs}to join. In{town}there is a{sports-centre}where there are lots of things to do likes{tennis, {keep-fit, fencing, judo}and lots of other sports. There are{two}nice {parks;}one is{Greenhead Park,}the other is{Beaumont Park.}Beaumont Pk is a{quiet park.}There are{swings, slides {and other things. Greenhead Pk}is a very large park. There are{tennis {courts}and a{variety of activities}for children. In Huddersfield there is a {Brass ensemble}which I attend. They go {all over the world,}which is something I would like to do. I think we should have an{ice skating rink}because the {nearest}one is in{Bradford. { {Samantha Rowe.12Yrs Moor End High Schl
